key_findings: The random_forest model achieved the best performance with ROC-AUC of 1.0000
Feature engineering created 29 new geological features
Ensemble methods generally outperformed individual models
3382 areas identified as high prospectivity targets
Alteration indices and element ratios were among the most important features
recommendations: Focus exploration efforts on areas with prospectivity scores >= 0.7
Validate model predictions with field geological mapping
Consider collecting additional geochemical samples in moderate prospectivity areas
Update models regularly with new exploration data
Use ensemble predictions for more robust prospectivity assessment
